Package com.here.platform.location.referencing.tmc

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TmcAdjacencyProvider
    A provider capable of returning next and previous locations for a given location with respect to an enclosing linear location.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PiecewiseTmcCoverage
    Generalized result of TMC reference creation.
    TmcCoverage
    Associates a LinearLocation with the reference it is covered by, if there is one.
    TmcId
    The ID of a specific TMC location.
    TmcTableId
    The TMC id of a specific location table.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EmptyTmcReferenceException  
    LinearLocationNotRepresentedInTmcException  
    LinearLocationNotValid  
    MissingExtendedCountryCodeException  
    NoLinearAvailableException  
    TmcCreatorException
    Base exception for TMC creation related errors.
    TmcResolverException
    Base exception for TMC resolution related errors.
    UnexpectedTmcEntryTypeException  
    UnknownTmcLocationException
